page.title: 03The Boy's Brigade in Jersey
page.content: Mr.H is the leader of the Boy's Brigade. I think he is a nice man because he organises all the activities. The activities consist of camping, cross-country, clubs and parades.When we go camping Mr.H brings the equipment and the food. Although we do our own cooking, washing and many other things, he actually organises the whole thing.When we go on parade marches he also organises the transport and uniforms. The cross country run is the biggest event. Mr.H gets up early and marks the course with tape, then he prepares refreshments and transports the boys to the course. At the end of the race the boys are glad of the refreshments.
